title: Drawing, "The Stage Door", 1935
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and Chinese white on paper
description: Group of four admirers surrounding an actress at the stage door. All dressed alike in black coats with white fox collars.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Stage Door", 1935.
1935. Pen and black ink, brush and Chinese white on paper. Gift of Christina Malman. 1947-110-18.
